title: Community Solar Program Subscription
description: A residential customer wants to sign up for a local community solar program to support renewable energy and receive bill credits.

tasks.description: Based on the customer's address, identify available community solar projects with open subscriptions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds one local solar farm with 10 remaining subscription slots.

tasks.description: Explain the program's terms, including the subscription fee and the estimated monthly bill credit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the costs and benefits.

tasks.description: Process the customer's subscription application and sign them up for a 5 kW share of the project.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully enrolls the customer in the program.
